parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
قيمة الترتيب:
                    nearest = الأقرب إليك,
                    lowest_price = الأقل سعراً,
                    highest_price = الأعلى سعراً,
                    largest_area = الأكبر مساحة,
                    smallest_area = الأصغر مساحة

400.description: Bad Request - User is individual, not service provider

get.description: Retrieve services with optional filtering by type, name, or active status

post.description: Creates a new service with the specified type and name

put.description: Updates an existing service with the specified ID

delete.description: Deletes an existing service with the specified ID

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or phone

additionalProperties.description: Whatever you pass to request body will be present here under the same key, with the same value.

license_number.description: The license number must be exactly 10 digits long and must begin with 72.

description.example: This is a description of the ad.

license_number.description: The license number must be exactly 10 digits long and must begin with 72.

is_special.description: Is the ad marked as special?

is_story.description: Is the ad shown as a story?

images.description: Array of image files. Each image must be one of: jpeg, png, gif, svg, webp, bmp, tiff and max 5MB each.

video.description: Video file (mp4, avi, mpeg, mov). Max size: 50MB.
